thread.title: Actually, the award for Best Picture goes to Janelle Monáe
thread.title_full: Actually, the award for Best Picture goes to Janelle Monáe

author: Rachel Paige
title: Actually, the award for Best Picture goes to Janelle Monáe
text:
Actually, the award for Best Picture goes to Janelle Monáe In the end, Moonlight took home the Oscar for Best Picture of the year, but we’d like to argue against that decision right here and right now. Moonlight was a fabulous movie, but it’s not the Best Picture of the 2017 Oscars.
These 9 pictures of Janelle Monáe are the Best Picture s of the 89th Academy Awards.
ROBYN BECK/Staff/Getty Images ROBYN BECK/Staff/Getty Images Janelle — who was in not one but TWO Oscar nominated (and winning) movies, Moonlight and Hidden Figures — showed up to the awards looking like . She completely stole the red carpet with her killer dress and amazing style. She certainly worked the camera with some looks, but it’s the pictures where she’s not posing for the camera that are our favorite right now.
Well, she is posing, and in the process totally living it up and we cannot get enough of her right now. Christopher Polk/Staff/Getty Images Christopher Polk/Staff/Getty Images She reapplied her lipstick in front of the camera. Like, this might as well be a straight up makeup ad for everything she’s wearing, and we will buy it all, just take our money (Janelle is actually a former Covergirl herself, nbd). Christopher Polk/Staff/Getty Images Her young Moonlight co-stars were even completely spellbound. Christopher Polk/Staf/Getty Imagesf Once inside the Dolby Theater, Janelle continued to command all the attention. Kevin Winter/Staff/Getty Images From now on, how about we invite Janelle to everything. Janelle, if you are reading this, you are invited to my next birthday party. Kevork Djansezian/Stringer/Getty Images Kevork Djansezian/Stringer/Getty Images Janelle might not have an Oscar of her own (YET), but she’s completely won over our hearts.
